description: Styles for the Tic Tac Toe web game's frontend, defining variables and styling for components such as the app layout, game board, and buttons.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container styling with flex layout and centered alignment.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: Container for the game layout, constraining width and providing padding.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Styling for the status message area, including font size and color.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Grid layout for the Tic Tac Toe board, arranging squares in a 3-column grid.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styling for individual game squares, including size, border, and hover effects.

classes.name: reset-button
classes.description: Style for the reset button with padding, background color, and hover effects.
